title: Bukkake
overview: This erotic comedy is a live-action adaptation of a manga by Seiji Matsuyama starring Yu Aine and other sexy actresses. Katsuta Chikuzen works under the tsundere boss Yuzu in the miscellaneous affairs section of Monosho Shoji, while being scolded by him. Late one night, Katsuta lines up at a game store in Akihabara, and meets Umina, who has super big...
